Classes

class  rgrl_feature_face_pt

Detailed Description

Class to represent a N-d face edge element.

It has 1 normal direction and N-1 tangent directions. There could be a defined image region surrounding these.

Author:
Chuck Stewart
Date:
16 Sep 2003
